definition: Better broken jade than intact tile./Death is preferable to dishonor. (idiom)
pinyin: ning4 wei2 yu4 sui4 , bu4 wei2 wa3 quan2

definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
